Headline: No trains between Kimball and Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between Belmont and the Loop.

 Shuttle buses are available between Kimball and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Division
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses rrted SB: Clark, Maple, and State; NB: State, Chicago, Dearborn, Walton, and Clark due to, street blockage near State/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/Division.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Maple, and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, Dearborn, Walton, and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.
